description: Episode of Series "World in action". Fourteen children from a variety of school backgrounds, interviewed in 1964 for television about their hopes and aspirations, are followed up twenty-one years later. Extracts from the interviews made when the children were seven, fourteen, twenty-one and twenty-eight years old are shown. Those involved, comment on any changes in their ideas. This film is suitable for years 11-12 and tertiary level.
